show_name: Maou Gakuin no Futekigousha: Shijou Saikyou no Maou no Shiso, Tensei shite Shison-tachi no Gakkou e
other_title: The Misfit of Demon King Academy: History's Strongest Demon King Reincarnates and Goes to School with His Descendants
The Misfit of Demon King Academy
魔王学院の不適合者 ～史上最強の魔王の始祖、転生して子孫たちの学校へ通う～
opening_theme: #2: "Seikai Fuseikai feat. Anos Voldigoad (正解不正解 feat.アノス・ヴォルディゴード)" by Anos Voldigoad (Tatsuhisa Suzuki) (eps 4, 13)
ending_theme: #2: "Hamidashimono (ハミダシモノ)" by Tomori Kusunoki (eps 2-13)
